price: Ɔkaa sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, εneε na mame berε (anaasε enku me) kosi Da a yεbenyane awufoͻ no“.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
